system:
You see a letter and open it.
The first letter of the word which rhymes with brother and is related to it.
(J)S (K)C (L)M
The first letter of the name of the snake that is bigger than python and doesn’t have 
venom
(J)C (K)M (L)A
The first letter of the name of the python discord admin, whose pfp is an animal
(J)K (K)S (L)Z
The first letter of the function in python which, 
when for-looped will give the output like this (0, elem) (1, elem) (2, elem)
(J)R (K)E (L)C
Combine the answers of the riddles and then meet a guy at the bar.

Press 'q'
Wrong answer! Try again
witch:
